meanings.definition: To place in a particular position or location.
meanings.sent1: She situates the vase on the table.
meanings.sent2: The map situates the city in the northeast.
meanings.sent3: The cat situates itself on the warm blanket.
meanings.sent4: His story situates the reader in a magical world.
meanings.sent5: The sign situates the entrance clearly for visitors.

meanings.definition: To be in a particular position or location.
meanings.sent1: The house situates on top of the hill.
meanings.sent2: The school situates near the park.
meanings.sent3: The toy car situates itself under the bed.
meanings.sent4: Her painting situates her in a dreamy landscape.
meanings.sent5: The sun situates in the sky every morning.
